why_choose: PSO1:Identify, analyze real world problems and design their ethical solutions using artificial intelligence, robotics, virtual/augmented reality, data analytics, block chain technology, and cloud computing.
PSO2:Design and develop the hardware sensor devices and related interfacing software systems for solving complex engineering problems.
PSO3:Understand inter-disciplinary computing techniques and to apply them in the design of advanced computing.
PSO4:Conduct investigation of complex problems with the help of technical, managerial, leadership qualities, and modern engineering tools provided by industry-sponsored laboratories.

PSO1:Identify, analyze real world problems and design their ethical solutions using artificial intelligence, robotics, virtual/augmented reality, data analytics, block chain technology, and cloud computing.
PSO2:Design and develop the hardware sensor devices and related interfacing software systems for solving complex engineering problems.

PSO1: Work as a software engineer in different dimensions of information technology to provide solutions to real-world and industrial problems in an eco-friendly manner.
PSO2: Apply knowledge of core subjects with multi-disciplinary and modern computing techniques to solve complex IT problems.

To Design an implement products using the cutting-edge Software and Hardware tools in electronics and communication engineering to satisfy the customer need.
To analyse and developed solution for the real time problem and to apply the knowledge for innovative ideas and solutions in Telecommunications, Wireless Networking, Embedded systems, and VLSI.
To demonstrate the technical skills, professional competence entrepreneurial attitude and deliver innovative solution to solve the society.
Engineering Knowledge :Apply the knowledge of mathematics, science, engineering fundamentals, and an engineering specialization to the solution of complex engineering problems.

Problem Analysis :Identify, formulate, review research literature, and analyze complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions using first principles of mathematics, natural sciences, and engineering sciences.

Design/Development of Solutions :Design solutions for complex engineering problems and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs with appropriate consideration for the public health and safety, and the cultural, societal, and environmental considerations.

Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems :Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments, analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions.

Engineering Knowledge: Apply knowledge of mathematics, natural science, computing, engineering fundamentals and an engineering specialization as specified in WK1 to WK4 respectively to develop to the solution of complex engineering problems.

Problem Analysis: Identify, formulate, review research literature and analyze complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions with consideration for sustainable development. (WK1 to WK4)

Design/Development of Solutions: Design creative solutions for complex engineering problems and design/develop systems/components/processes to meet identified needs with consideration for the public health and safety, whole-life cost, net zero carbon, culture, society and environment as required. (WK5)

Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems: Conduct investigations of complex engineering problems using research-based knowledge including design of experiments, modelling, analysis & interpretation of data to provide valid conclusions. (WK8)

facilities: ADMISSION HELP admission@niet.co.in +91-8010-500-700 Apply Online 2025 Academic Facilities Home Infrastructure Academic Facilities State Of The Art Facilities To Support Academic Excellence Classrooms We at NIET, believe that the whole process of teaching can be highly enhanced by using the latest technological tools which further helps the students gain a better understanding of tough concepts and gives a boost by providing the ways and means to visualize the concept being put forward by the professors, or let’s say, the education experts. Hence, the classrooms are well-equipped with projectors, computers, high-tech sound systems, OHPs and other kinds of audio-visual tools. 150 Classrooms The classrooms have ergonomically designed furniture, seamless Wi-Fi connectivity, climate controlling systems, aesthetic lighting, and visually pleasing interiors that make the environment of the classroom more conducive towards learning. Library The libraries at NIET occupy over 14,000 square feet area and provide students access to a vast repository of resources, including books and periodicals. The peaceful and sunlit areas provide ideal study spaces. 14,000 square meters of built-up space Our libraries remain open until midnight on all days. During the examinations, they remain open for 24 hours. Completely automated library management systems make it possible to borrow books at any time of the day or night, as well as make reservations online. Multiple copies ensure that resources are easily available for reference in the library. Trained staff are always at hand to assist students. Laboratories NIET believes in acing the practicality along with the theoretical expertise. The laboratories we possess, aren’t just for conducting chemical experiments, but also for brainstorming new ideas as well as learning new things every day. With refined infrastructure and best-in-market equipment to work on, the laboratories aim to fulfil every curiosity that a keen mind has towards learning. 27 Innovation Labs Apart from the technical aspects, the labs also help the students learn practical implementation of the theoretical knowledge with the assistance from our team of expert professors and lab assistants. See More

ADMISSION HELP admission@niet.co.in +91-8010-500-700 Apply Online 2025 Hostel Facilities Home Campus Facilities Hostel Facilities The hostel provides the students with an atmosphere much like a home away from home. It provides them with all the necessary facilities, which help them to acclimatize well with this new ambience. Our hostel has its own mess, which is managed and run by the students themselves on co-operative basis. Keeping in mind the different tastes of the students, the mess provides them with healthy and tasty food. Five hostels for boys and two for girls on the campus offer well-ventilated, comfortable rooms. Rooms are available on multi sharing basis. Library and internet facility is also provided to hostel students after college time. Medical facility is also provided to the students all the time. 24 hours RO water supply and power backup is available in hostel. Security guards are posted at the gate of hostels day and night. Canteen, Medical Aid, Xerox, Stationary facility etc are also available for the students. Hostel Management The following officers constitute the Hostel Management: Director Chief Warden Faculty Wardens Resident Wardens Care Taker A Resident warden who resides in the hostel manages each hostel. The diners of mess may be drawn from different hostels. A Warden administers each mess. The students can approach any of the above officers for help, guidance and grievance redressal. Representations to higher officers must be forwarded through proper channel. Accommodation Type of Rooms Two Seater Two Seater (Air Cooled) Two Seater with attached bathroom Three Seater Three Seater (Air Cooled) Three Seater with attached bathroom Four Seater Hostel Wardens Mr. Rakesh Kumar Singh Chief Warden (Plot 19) Mr. Vikrant Malik Faculty Warden Mr. Brijesh Tripathi Resident Warden Boys Hostel Mr. Adesh Kumar Resident Warden Boys Hostel Ms. Ranjana Singh Resident Girls hostel Warden Ms. Sanjaylata Tiwari Resident Girls hostel Warden Photos Gallery Rooms Mess Sports Gymnasium Facilities at NIET Hostels Cameras in Hostels State of Art Gymnasium Cooperative Mess Wi-fi Enabled Hostel Medical Facility Hot and Cold Water Supply Security Library and Study Room 24 Hour Power Backup RO Drinking Water Supply Common Room Indoor and outdoor Games Guest Rooms Smart Laundry Pest Control Medical Facility It is to inform all the residents of NIET hostel that for medical claim the students have to follow some rules which are mentioned below. Also we are providing doctor and medical facility inside the campus .i.e. For Plot No-19:- Dr. Ravi Sharma, MBBS (Physician) B.Pharma Block Timings-(05:00 to 06:00) For Plot No-14:- Dr. Ravi Sharma MBBS (Physician) Chief Warden Office Timings-(06:00 to 07:00) The residents of NIET hostels are medically insured and their medical expenditures incurred during OPD/Hospitalization of any hospital in Greater Noida will be reimbursed by the institute. The rules of reimbursement are given as under:- Maximum of Rs 3000/- (Three Thousand only) in a month of OPD consultancy + medicine bills etc. can be reimbursed to the students. In case of causality/hospitalization, a maximum of Rs 20,000/- (Twenty Thousand only) can be reimbursed to the students. To reimburse the medical bills, students should submit original bills along with prescription report to the Chief Warden/Warden within three days of his/her visit to doctor/hospitalization. All the bills should be made in favor of concerned students. Student should follow the above set of rules for medical refund and submit the application of refund in the Chief Warden office between 05:00pm to 06:00pm.

ADMISSION HELP admission@niet.co.in +91-8010-500-700 Apply Online 2025 Other Facilities Home Campus Facilities Other Facilities Auditorium / Seminar Hall NIET has a well-designed auditorium where many students take the center stage and showcase their scholastic and cultural talents. The auditorium provides students a platform to engage in various extra-curricular activities and build their personalities. Conference Room NIET, Greater Noida boasts state-of-the-art conference room facilities, providing an ideal environment for academic gatherings, corporate meetings, and various events. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, the institute offers a sophisticated space designed to accommodate diverse needs and foster collaborative discussions. The conference rooms at Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology are equipped with advanced audiovisual technology, including high-definition projectors, sound systems, and interactive display screens, ensuring seamless presentations and effective communication. Whether hosting lectures, seminars, or workshops, these facilities are tailored to enhance the learning and engagement experience for participants. Moreover, the spacious and well-appointed conference rooms offer flexible seating arrangements to accommodate different group sizes and event formats. From intimate discussions to larger gatherings, the layout can be customized to suit specific requirements, ensuring comfort and convenience for all attendees. In addition to cutting-edge technology and versatile layouts, the conference rooms are designed with modern aesthetics and ergonomic furnishings, creating a professional yet inviting ambiance. Natural light and ergonomic seating contribute to a productive and comfortable environment, promoting focus and creativity throughout the duration of the event. Furthermore, the institute's central location in Greater Noida provides easy accessibility for participants coming from various parts of the city and beyond. Ample parking facilities and proximity to public transportation make it convenient for attendees to reach the venue, enhancing the overall experience of hosting and attending events at the institute. The conference room facilities at Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology are supported by a dedicated team of professionals who provide technical assistance and logistical support to ensure the smooth execution of events. From event planning to on-site coordination, the staff is committed to delivering a seamless and memorable experience for organizers and participants alike. In conclusion, the conference room facilities at Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, Greater Noida offer a perfect blend of technology, functionality, and aesthetics. Whether for academic pursuits or corporate gatherings, these facilities provide an ideal setting for fostering collaboration, innovation, and knowledge exchange. With its commitment to excellence and hospitality, the institute continues to be a preferred choice for hosting a wide range of events in the region. Recording Room At NIET, Greater Noida, we understand the essence of providing state-of-the-art recording room facilities to nurture creativity and elevate production standards. Our recording rooms are meticulously designed to offer an optimal acoustic environment, equipped with cutting-edge technology to cater to the diverse needs of our students and professionals alike. The cornerstone of any recording room is its acoustics. Our facilities are engineered with precision to control sound reflections, minimizing unwanted reverberations and external noise interference. This ensures that recordings are crisp, clear, and devoid of any distortions, allowing artists to express themselves with unparalleled clarity. Moreover, our recording rooms are equipped with top-of-the-line recording equipment, including microphones, audio interfaces, and monitoring systems, curated to meet industry standards. This enables our users to capture every nuance of their performance with precision, empowering them to produce high-fidelity audio that resonates with audiences worldwide. Furthermore, we understand the importance of flexibility in the creative process. Our recording rooms are designed to accommodate various setups and configurations, catering to different recording techniques and styles. Whether it's a solo vocal recording, a full band ensemble, or a live podcast session, our facilities are tailored to adapt to the unique requirements of each project seamlessly. Beyond technical specifications, our recording room facilities foster an environment conducive to creativity and collaboration. From inspiring aesthetics to comfortable furnishings, every aspect is curated to inspire and elevate the creative process. Our aim is to provide an immersive experience where artists can unleash their full potential without constraints, fostering innovation and artistic expression. At NIET, we take pride in offering world-class recording room facilities that empower artists to push boundaries, defy conventions, and create impactful audio content that resonates with audiences worldwide. Join us in harnessing the power of sound and unleashing the full spectrum of creative expression. Transporation The transport service at NIET operates with a fleet of well-maintained buses equipped with modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable and safe journey for students and staff. These buses follow a meticulously planned route covering key locations in Delhi NCR, including major residential areas and transportation hubs. The scheduling of the transport service is designed to align with the academic and administrative requirements of the institute, ensuring punctuality and reliability. Whether it's early morning classes or late-night study sessions, NIET's transport service ensures that students and staff can commute conveniently without any hassle Safety remains a top priority at NIET, with trained drivers adhering to strict safety protocols and regulations. Additionally, the buses are equipped with GPS tracking systems, enabling real-time monitoring for enhanced security. NIET's commitment to providing top-notch transport facilities reflects its dedication to fostering a conducive learning and working environment for its community. By offering reliable and efficient transportation services, NIET strives to alleviate commuting concerns and enhance the overall experience for students and staff residing in Delhi NCR.
